ygData.msgSnippet: OK, now this could get interesting, does anyone have a score card for this battle? so far theres trainers, mutants, Autobots, Decepticons, Terrorcons,

OK, now this could get interesting, does anyone have a score card for this
battle? so far theres trainers, mutants, Autobots, Decepticons, Terrorcons,
Predacons (Gestault), and I'm sure ther'll be others.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, March 31, 2001 10:38 PM
Subject: Re: CF Skimirsh


> *gasp* At last! I think my comp is functioning pretty much ok now, so I'm
back. I just read 150+ posts, so this might be grossly inaccurate. It it is,
sorry.
>
>
> ::Autofire/Zardus/The Galactors/The Lavacons/Prowl/Kluster/Grimmler::
>
> Autofire recieves the signal from Megatron, yelling a battle cry and
running toward the CF, only to be met with a smoke bomb as soon as he
started running. He swears, waving the smoke away and backing up, firing his
chain guns blindly in the general direction of the CF. He grunts as two
objects hit him in the back, feeling his systems struggle as they tried to
regain power, the two objects that had hit him draining energy faster than
he could replace it.
>
> He spins around, backing away from the draining energy fields that the two
missiles fired by Zardus had created. The drain lessens and his power levels
begin to rise again. He looks up at the enemy, watching Zardus fly in, more
than ten Alliance bots following. This was definitely not good.
>
> "Yes, attack," he replies to the member of the Predacons (gestalt group,
not faction) who had sent him a comm, aiming both chain guns at Zardus and
firing more than two dozen shots from each.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus angles up, the shots fired by the bot he had just hit with the
missiles missing. He scans the area, seeing that there were a good amount of
Decepticons here. He activates his comm.
>
> "Astral," he says into it, "New orders. Come and aid at this battle, bring
all the troops that you can."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Galactors spread out as they fly into the scene. Supernova aims his
missile launcher, letting loose several shots at Rippersnapper.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "Lessee, who I wanna kill?" Flare says, then fires two grenades down at
Sinnertwin.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Vicyr, completely cloaked, flies below the others, firing three laser
bolts at Rampage.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slasys aims carefully, firing two missiles with deadly precision down at
Razorclaw.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scrap, flying to the left of the rest of the group, fires four lasers down
at Rippersnapper.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl spins around to look at the smoke when he recieves Quarto's message,
thankful for the warning. He sees Alliance bots fly in in the distance and
open fire on the attackers.
>
> "Time for battle yet again," he says to Mantle, flying into the air and
seeing someone attacking behind the CF. He flies toward Fireblade, landing
quickly near Firedrill and his friends.
>
> "Nice to see you both up and about," he says to the two that he hadn't
seen conscious untill now. "You guys are welcome to help defend the base."
>
> Prowl lifts off again, flying at Fireblade and firing two missiles at him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster runs out of the CF as the alarms go off, his missile launcher
firing two missiles at Rippersnapper as soon as he gets out of the door,
aiming carefully as to not hit any Maximals.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> (Argh, forgot about Grimmler! Sorry if I didn't reply to your last post
with Tremmer, Megan)
>
> Grimmler hears gunfire as he heads back to the CF. "Slag! We're under
attack again!" He exclaims and runs off toward the ship, motioning for
Tremmer to follow.
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > ::Rippersnapper/Preadcons::
> > Rippersnapper's impatience increases, "Signal! Me wanna destroy
> > Maximals."
> >
> > Razorclaw nears the location intended by Megatron. He opens a
> > commlink to Autofire, "Hello Autofire. I am Razorclaw of the
> > Predacons. Megatron sent me and my Predacons as
> > renforcements, he told us to expect a signal to attack soon, and
> > we are arriving and ready."
> >
> > Divebomb reaches Autofire first, lands and transforms, looking
> > around and smiling.
> >
> > Rampage is thundering on behind Razorclaw, a sleek panther, a
> > blur on the background. He dodges trees, speeding to the
> > destination, Razorclaw doing likewise, after his commlink message.
>
>
>
>

>
